title: Learner-Centered Science E-Learning System Design Process

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Learner-Tailored E-Learning System Design and Practical Application for Enhancing Work-Integrated Scientific Competencies of Office/Administrative Professionals

learning_goals: Can explain the e-learning system design process, divided into three or more stages, reflecting learner requirements
Can directly design interactive learning modules for project-based learning (PBL) in the science domain
Can propose three or more improvement plans for e-learning systems based on learner experience (UX) evaluations
Can establish strategies for utilizing collaborative tools operable in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
